title: PDF & Web Extraction
description: Extract and visualize data from PDFs and websites

cells.content:
PDF & Web Data Extraction

Vibe Widget can extract data from PDFs and web pages, then create interactive visualizations. This demo shows two examples: a 3D solar system from PDF data and a Hacker News clone from web scraping.

import vibe_widget as vw
import pandas as pd

vw.models()
cells.label: Setup

cells.content:
# Configure (demo mode - no actual LLM calls)
vw.config(
    model="google/gemini-3-flash-preview",
    api_key="demo-key"
)
cells.label: Config

cells.content:
3D Solar System (from PDF)

This visualization was generated from a PDF containing planetary data. Vibe Widget extracted the table data and created an interactive 3D model.

# Load planets data (extracted from PDF)
print(f"Planets data: {len(planets_df)} planets")
print(f"Columns: {list(planets_df.columns)}")
planets_df.head()
cells.label: Planets Data

cells.content:
# Create 3D solar system visualization
solar_system = vw.create(
    "3D solar system using Three.js showing planets orbiting with realistic relative sizes and orbital periods",
    data=planets_df,
    outputs=vw.outputs(
        selected_planet="Currently selected planet name"
    ),
)

solar_system
cells.label: Solar System

cells.content:
Hacker News Clone (from Web)

This widget shows stories scraped from Hacker News. Vibe Widget can fetch and parse web content to create custom visualizations.

# Load Hacker News stories (scraped from website)
print(f"HN stories: {len(hn_df)} stories")
hn_df.head(3)
cells.label: HN Data

cells.content:
# Create interactive Hacker News clone
hn_clone = vw.create(
    "Interactive Hacker News clone widget with story list, upvotes, and comment counts",
    data=hn_df,
)

hn_clone
cells.label: HN Clone

cells.content:
How It Works

# PDF Extraction
solar_system = vw.create(
    description="3D visualization...",
    data="../testdata/planets.pdf",  # PDF path
    outputs=vw.outputs(
        selected_planet="selected planet name"
    )
)

# Web Scraping
hn_clone = vw.create(
    description="Hacker News clone...",
    data="https://news.ycombinator.com",  # URL
)

Vibe Widget automatically detects the data type (PDF, URL, CSV, etc.) and handles extraction, parsing, and visualization generation!
